import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';
import TipFaucet from '../../_admonitions/_tip-faucet.md';
import AliasNFT from '../../_admonitions/_alias_nft_wallet.md';

Once you have
[requested funds from the faucet](./request-funds.mdx) you are ready to send your first
transaction from an alias account.

<AliasNFT />
<TipFaucet />

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

The following example will:

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html), get Alice's `Account` which was
   [created in the first guide](../accounts-and-addresses/create-account.mdx).
2. Sync the account with the node to get the latest transactions by calling the [`Account.sync()`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/account/struct.Account.html#method.sync)
   function. Note how the [`SyncOptions`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/account/struct.SyncOptions.html) for the Alias set [`AliasSyncOptions.basicOutputs`](../../references/nodejs/interfaces/AliasSyncOptions.md#basicoutputs)
   to `true`.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/transaction.rs#L28-L34
```

</div>

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/transaction.rs#L47
```

</div>

3. Retrieve the Alias Id of the first [`AliasOutput`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/types/block/output/alias/struct.AliasOutput.html) related to Alice's
   account.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/transaction.rs#L52
```

</div>

4. Retrieve the Alias' address using the [`Client.alias_id_to_bech32()`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/client/core/struct.ClientInner.html#method.alias_id_to_bech32)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/transaction.rs#L56
```

</div>

5. Send 1 SMR to an address using the [`Account.send()`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/account/struct.Account.html#method.send) function.
   Make sure to update the code sample to send to the address of your choice.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/transaction.rs#L67-L76
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

The following example will:

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html), get Alice's `Account` which was
   [created in the first guide](../accounts-and-addresses/create-account.mdx).
2. Sync the account with the node to get the latest transactions by calling the [`Account.sync()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Account.md#sync)
   function. Note how the [`SyncOptions`](../../references/nodejs/interfaces/SyncOptions.md#alias) for the Alias set [`AliasSyncOptions.basicOutputs`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/account/struct.AliasSyncOptions.html)
   to `true`.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/transaction.ts#L28-L32
```

</div>

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/transaction.ts#L44
```

</div>

3. Retrieve the Alias Id of the first [`AliasOutput`](../../references/nodejs/classes/AliasOutput.md) related to Alice's
   account.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/transaction.ts#L51
```

</div>

4. Retrieve the Alias' address using the [`Utils.aliasIdToBech32()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Utils.md#aliasidtobech32)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/transaction.ts#L55-L58
```

</div>

5. Define the inputs for the transaction as the first Output that can be unlocked by the Alias address.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/transaction.ts#L61-L68
```

</div>

6. Send 1 SMR to an address using the [`Account.sendWithParams()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Account.md#sendwithparams) function.
   Make sure to update the code sample to send to the address of your choice.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/transaction.ts#L70-L81
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

The following example will:

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html), get Alice's `Account` which was
   [created in the first guide](../accounts-and-addresses/create-account.mdx).
2. Sync the account with the node to get the latest transactions by calling the [`Account.sync()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/account.md#sync)
   function. Note how the [`sync_options`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/sync_options.md) for the Alias set [`AliasSyncOptions.basic_outputs`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/sync_options.md#aliassyncoptions-objects)
   to `true`.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/transaction.py#L12
```

</div>

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/transaction.py#L23
```

</div>

3. Retrieve the Alias Id of the first `AliasOutput` related to Alice's account.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/transaction.py#L28
```

</div>

4. Retrieve the [`AliasAddress`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/types/address.md#aliasaddress-objects) using the [`Utils.alias_id_to_bech32()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/utils.md#alias_id_to_bech32)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/transaction.py#L32-L33
```

</div>

5. Define the inputs for the transaction as the first Output that can be unlocked by the Alias address.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/transaction.py#L36-L38
```

</div>

6. Send 1 SMR to an address using the [`Account.send_with_params()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/account.md#send_with_params) function.
   Make sure to update the code sample to send to the address of your choice.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/alias_wallet/transaction.py#L44-L47
```

</div>

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

### Expected Output

```plaintext
Balance before sending funds from alias: 2000000000
Alias Id: 0x81df8f7e1ad625befebf1456cd0775a124b47a274061010e080bbf7c18593acc
Transaction with custom input: https://explorer.shimmer.network/testnet/transaction/0x0f2f72e09a3a9f9fc8cd1fd4e196c2d198580ec9c873efcf5d6d99809bd9e8f7
Balance after sending funds from alias: 1999000000
```
